verses.kjv: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.
verses.ct: We thank you, God — we thank you! Your presence is near, and your amazing deeds prove it.

verses.kjv: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.
verses.ct: "When I choose the appointed time, I will judge with fairness."

verses.kjv: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.
verses.ct: "When the earth and everyone on it trembles, I am the one who holds its foundations steady." Selah.

verses.kjv: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:
verses.ct: I warned the arrogant, "Stop your foolishness!" and to the wicked I said, "Don't flaunt your power!"

verses.kjv: Lift not up your horn on high: speak not with a stiff neck.
verses.ct: "Don't raise your power up high — don't speak with stubborn defiance."

verses.kjv: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.
verses.ct: Advancement doesn't come from the east, the west, or the south.

verses.kjv: But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.
verses.ct: It is God who serves as judge — he brings one person down and raises another up.

verses.kjv: For in the hand of the LORD there is a cup, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring them out, and drink them.
verses.ct: The LORD holds a cup in his hand, filled with foaming, well-mixed wine. He pours it out, and every wicked person on earth will drain it down to the last drop.

verses.kjv: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.
verses.ct: But as for me, I will proclaim this forever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.

verses.kjv: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; but the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.
verses.ct: "I will break off all the power of the wicked, but the power of the righteous will be lifted high."
